glama_rds-openapi.name: rds-openapi
glama_rds-openapi.display_name: Alibaba Cloud RDS OpenAPI MCP Server
glama_rds-openapi.config_file: mcp_config\glama\Alibaba Cloud RDS OpenAPI MCP Server.json

glama_Dynamics365.name: Dynamics365
args: <Path to your MCP server build file ex: rootfolder/build/index.js>

glama_zen.name: zen
args: for p in $(which uvx 2>/dev/null) $HOME/.local/bin/uvx /opt/homebrew/bin/uvx /usr/local/bin/uvx uvx; do [ -x "$p" ] && exec "$p" --from git+https://github.com/BeehiveInnovations/zen-mcp-server.git zen-mcp-server; done; echo 'uvx not found' >&2; exit 1

glama_jinni.name: jinni
glama_jinni.display_name: Jinni_ Bring Your Project Into Context
glama_jinni.config_file: mcp_config\glama\Jinni_ Bring Your Project Into Context.json

glama_kuzu.name: kuzu
args: {Path to the directory containing Kuzu database file}:/database

glama_finance_openapi.name: finance_openapi
glama_finance_openapi.display_name: MCP Server_ Scalable OpenAPI Endpoint Discovery and API Request Tool
args: GLOBAL_TOOL_PROMPT='Access to insights apis for ACME Financial Services abc.com .'
glama_finance_openapi.config_file: mcp_config\glama\MCP Server_ Scalable OpenAPI Endpoint Discovery and API Request Tool.json
